caption:
If you're new to menstrual discs, we've got your back (and front). Flex Reusable Disc is the newbie's best friend. Besides 12-hour wear, cloud-like comfort, and the fact that it’s designed to reduce cramps, here are 2 more reasons this disc shines:⁠
⁠
🤏 Insertion Notch: Our patented notch not only makes it easier to fold the disc, but it also creates a leading edge (a narrower point) for perfect placement during insertion. An easy, smooth, and comfy process.⁠
⁠
💯 Non-slip Rim: During removal, the non-slip rim makes it super easy to grip and pull the disc out.⁠ 
⁠
Whether you're a first-timer or a seasoned pro, our disc is here to make your period easier and more comfortable. ✨ ⁠

P.S. Did we mention it holds up to 6+ super tampons of blood? That’s 70mL! 😮
⁠
#OnMyPeriod #PeriodTalk #MenstrualDisc #ReusableDisc101 #PeriodMadeEasy
